OOC: How tall is Menasor?

BIC:

Condor/Starice:

"HEY!!!!" protested Condor, he couldn't do anithing to avoit to being 
captured, he shouted while he fought to be free  "LET ME BE BRAINLESS 
BOT!!!!!"


"COOOOOONDORRR!" as femme voice screamed horrified somewhere.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> "Yes, that one," replied Astroblast with an exasperated tone.
> 
>

> 
> > Menasor heard Astroblasts words but barely. He looked around 
confused.

him,

Firearm he

Condor,
> > towering over the small robot. "Get this Maximal?" he boomed, and 
reached
